parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to complete the Takata airbag recall can lead to serious injury or death in the event of an accident, as the airbag may not deploy properly or may rupture, causing shrapnel to be ejected into the passenger compartment.
symptoms: as the issue is related to a recall and not a specific symptom or failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty design of the AC belt tensioner can cause the accessory belt to rub against it, leading to premature wear and eventual failure, which can result in the loss of critical vehicle systems such as cooling, charging, and power steering, posing a safety risk to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The accessory belt rubs against the AC tensioner
causing premature wear and eventual failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Manifold Absolute Pressure (MAP) Sensor and ECM Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning MAP sensor and potential ECM issues can cause the check engine light to illuminate intermittently, leading to uncertainty and frustration for the driver. If left unaddressed, this issue can lead to decreased engine performance, reduced fuel efficiency, and potentially cause more severe engine damage.
symptoms: The check engine light comes on and off randomly
and the issue persists despite replacing the MAP sensor and cleaning the intake.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gear shift module can cause the vehicle to lose acceleration, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: the engine revs when the gas pedal is pressed
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
error code U0103 appears on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the concentric slave cylinder can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
fluid leaks from the slave cylinder.
